This is the last of the stock for this promotion and anything as soon as we have run out the promotion will end (At the current rate that won't be long).

Since the last thread 2 weeks ago we had comments regarding our AUP which can be found at http://rethinkvps.com/Tos.  There was talks with our AUP being quite low for the unmetered provider that we are, well after talks within the company we have doubled our bandwidth to our provider which has in turn allowed us to double the AUP.  If you have any questions regarding our upgrade please send me a PM or an email to sam (AT) rethinkvps.com and I will answer them as soon as possible.


**About ReThinkVPS**

We have got into the position where our network is now growing very steadily and we would like you all to be able to try out our network and services without having to break the bank.
